segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's move on to your dependents. Can you provide me with the full name of your dependent?
Great, and do you happen to have her date of birth handy?
segments.client_message: Yeah, she was born on 15-06-2005, and, um, I guess she's still a dependent until she's 18, right? So that would be until 15-06-2023.
